Description:
Notice PN P/HW/GFP/150322/01 / 312351243 - PN served - You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to the dangerous rotating parts of your Hurco BMC30 CNC milling machine, serial number B3M-01202010 EB, for example, by using interlocking devices fitted to the enclosure doors

Notice IN I/HW/GFP/150322/01 - served re You have failed to ensure that exposure of your employees to substances hazardous to health, namely water mix metalworking fluids used with your CNC machines, is either prevented, or where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled, to as low a level as is reasonably practicable.
